cards.name: Ancient Battleground
cards.text: Each friendly creature cannot reap and gains, "'''After Fight:''' Gain 1[[File:Enhance_aember.png|18px|frameless|class=aemberImg|link=|alt=Aember icon]]."

cards.name: Endless Hordes
cards.text: Play: For each enemy creature, make a token creature, ready it, and have it fight that enemy creature, ignoring taunt. Resolve these fights one at a time.

cards.name: Frost Giant
cards.text: Frost Giant does not ready during your "ready cards" step.

cards.name: Hallafest
cards.text: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for up to 4 Bräkken cards with different names. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Gain chains equal to the number of cards put into your hand this way.

cards.name: Harmal Atoon
cards.text: Each other friendly Brobnar creature gains, "Destroyed:Return this creature to its owner's hand."

cards.name: Kretchee
cards.text: Each time a player exalts a creature or a creature captures Aember, put 1 Aember on that creature from the common supply.

cards.name: Nirbor Flamewing
cards.text: At the start of your turn, if Nirbor Flamewing is in your discard, you may destroy a friendly creature. If you do, put Nirbor Flamewing into play ready. Destroyed: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Revna Starsong
cards.text: Each friendly Berserker loses all fight effects.

cards.name: Brawl In
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. Enrage them.

cards.name: Broken Axe Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, deal 6 D to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Crim Torchtooth
cards.text: Splash-attack 4. (When this creature attacks, also deal 4 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.) After Fight: Enrage each of Crim Torchtooth's neighbors.

cards.name: Feats of Strength
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each time an enemy creature is destroyed in a fight, make a token creature.

cards.name: Ged Hammer
cards.text: Destroyed: Ready and enrage each other friendly Brobnar creature.

cards.name: The Grand Gord
cards.text: At the start of your turn, if you control the most powerful creature (or a creature tied for most powerful), make a token creature.

cards.name: Vow of Blood
cards.text: Enhance Damage DamagePlay: Deal 2 Damage to each damaged enemy creature.

cards.name: Vulka
cards.text: Each friendly Brobnar creature gains splash-attack 1.

cards.name: Brikk Nastee
cards.text: After another friendly Brobnar creature fights, gain 1 Aember.

cards.name: Crogg The Clumsy
cards.text: Splash-attack 2. (When this creature attacks, also deal 2 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.)

cards.name: Fresh Marks
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, exalt 3 enemy creatures.

cards.name: Jarl Svend
cards.text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Jarl Svend, make a token creature. (Jarl Svend must survive the fight.)

cards.name: Might Club
cards.text: Action: Ready and enrage a creature.

cards.name: Pelf
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) After Fight: Your opponent loses 1 Aember.

cards.name: Press Gang
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If an enemy creature was destroyed this turn, archive Press Gang.

cards.name: Ragnarok Prep
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Then, if you control more creatures than your opponent, your opponent loses 2 Aember.

cards.name: Rant and Rive
cards.text: Play: If your opponent has 8 Aember or more, they lose half their Aember (rounding down the loss).

cards.name: Rowdy Skald
cards.text: Enhance Aember Damage Damage

cards.name: Shock Herder
cards.text: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) Play: Ready and fight with a neighboring creature.

cards.name: Stratosmack
cards.text: Play: Deal 3 Damage to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, make a token creature.

cards.name: Berserker
cards.text: Berserker enters play ready and enraged. Fight: Destroy Berserker.

cards.name: Warrior
cards.text: Warrior cannot reap unless there are no enemy creatures in play.

cards.name: Skirmisher
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)

cards.name: Grumpus
cards.text: Splash-attack 1. (When this creature attacks, also deal 1 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.)

cards.name: Æmbitrage
cards.text: Your keys cost +1 Aember. During your "draw cards" step, refill your hand to 1 additional card.

cards.name: Antiquities Dealer
cards.text: Action: Gain 2 Aember if you control at least one artifact.

cards.name: Avid Collecting
cards.text: Play: Return a friendly token creature to your hand.

cards.name: Conductor Jărroyă
cards.text: After Reap: Ready each friendly Buggy artifact.

cards.name: Corner the Market
cards.text: Play: During your opponent's next turn, they cannot play cards, and each time they discard a card from their hand, they may archive that card.

cards.name: Cursed Relic
cards.text: Enhance Aember Aember Aember Aember Aember Aember. You cannot play Cursed Relic or choose to discard it from your hand.

cards.name: Envoy of Ekwirrĕ
cards.text: Reap: Swap Envoy of Ekwirrĕ with one of its neighbors. Also swap all Aember, damage, counters, and upgrades on those creatures.

cards.name: Flea Market
cards.text: Action: Look at a random card in your opponent's hand. You may give your opponent 1 Aember. If you do, play that card as if it were yours.

cards.name: Freelancer
cards.text: At the start of each turn, the active player takes control of this creature. This creature may be used as if it belonged to the active house.

cards.name: Insurance Policy
cards.text: Play: Lose 1 Aember. This creature gains, "Destroyed: If it is not your turn, gain 4 Aember."

cards.name: Molluscaller
cards.text: Reap: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly Strange Shell gets +3 power and loses all abilities.

cards.name: Staff Up
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn. when any amount of Aember would be added to your pool, make that many token creatures instead.

cards.name: Talent Scout
cards.text: Talent Hunter can be used as if it belonged to the active house. Play: Look at your opponent's hand and play a creature as if it were yours. Your opponent gains control of Talent Hunter.

cards.name: The Æmber Road
cards.text: Omni: Put 1 trade counter on The Æmber Road, then gain 1 Aember for each trade counter on it. Give control of The Æmber Road to your opponent.

cards.name: Token of Appreciation
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Forge a key at +7 Aember current cost, reduced by 1 Aember for each friendly token creature.

cards.name: Tourist Trap
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Action: Choose a friendly token creature and an enemy creature. If you do, swap control of those creatures.

cards.name: Transitory Philosopher
cards.text: Action: Steal 1 Aember for each enemy artifact.

cards.name: Exchange Program
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly flank creature and an enemy flank creature. If you do, swap control of those creatures.

cards.name: Exo-shell System
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Each friendly token creature gains elusive.

cards.name: Gèzdrutyü the Arcane
cards.text: Action: Steal 2 Aember. Flip Gèzdrutyò the Arcane facedown (it becomes a token creature).

cards.name: Gezrăhi Blacksmith
cards.text: Elusive. At the start of each player's turn, that player chooses to either make a token creature od draw a card.

cards.name: Ikwikĭ Outpost
cards.text: ''Action:''' Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Market Crash
cards.text: Play: Destroy each non-token creature. Gain 2 chains.

cards.name: Niffle Paw
cards.text: This creature gains, "Reap: Destroy this creature and attach Niffle Paw to another creature.

cards.name: Outnegotiate
cards.text: Play: Choose a card in your discard pile. Steal Aember equal to the number of Aember bonus icons on it and put that card on the bottom of its owner's deck.

cards.name: Pull Up Stakes
cards.text: Play: Shuffle 2 friendly creatures into their owners' decks. Return 4 enemy creatures to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Puzzling Trinket
cards.text: Enhance Aember Aember. When you resolve an Aember bonus icon, you may choose to resole it as a Capture, Damage, or Draw icon instead.

cards.name: Sandhopper
cards.text: Action: Return a friendly creature to its owner's hand. If you do, you may play a non-Ekwidon creature from your hand.

cards.name: Scrapscrounger
cards.text: Reap: Swap an artifact in your discard pile with a card in your hand.

cards.name: Shĭzyokŭ Swopper
cards.text: After Fight: Swap control of this creature and the creature it fights. (Both creatures must survive the fight.)

cards.name: Trade Secrets
cards.text: Play: Discard any number of Ekwidon cards from your hand. Steal 1 Aember for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Tya-Arhiĭ Esquire
cards.text: Each friendly non-token creature gains, "Destroyed: Make a token creature.”

cards.name: Uncommon Currency
cards.text: Action: Swap control of Uncommon Currency and an enemy artifact.

cards.name: Auction Off
cards.text: Play: Purge an artifact. Its controller gains 1 Aember.

cards.name: Belligerent Guard
cards.text: Belligerent Guard enters play ready. Play: Your opponent draws a card.

cards.name: Closed-Door Negotiation
cards.text: Play: Your opponent draws a card. Steal 1 Aember. If you do and your opponent still has more Aember than you, trigger this effect again.

cards.name: Dthoshrǎ, Recruiter
cards.text: After Reap: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Forced Retirement
cards.text: Play: Destroy a creature. If you do, its controller gains 1 Aember.

cards.name: Gemcoat Vendor
cards.text: Action: Steal 1 Aember. Deal 1 Damage to Gemcoat Vendor.

cards.name: General Ză Orhă
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damge in return.) Play: For each forged key your opponent has, make a token creature.

cards.name: Generous Offer
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, steal 2 Aember.

cards.name: Hire On
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If there is a combined total of 6 Aember or more between both players' pools, archive Hire On.

cards.name: Mass Buyout
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature. Each player gains Æmber equal to half the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way (rounded up).

cards.name: Ornate Talking Tray
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Ornate Talking Tray. Make a token creature.

cards.name: Shopping Spree
cards.text: Play: Discard your hand. Draw a card for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Shrewd Investor
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
'''Play:''' You may have your opponent gain 1[[File:Enhance_aember.png|18px|frameless|class=aemberImg|link=|alt=Aember icon]]. If you do, capture 4[[File:Enhance_aember.png|18px|frameless|class=aemberImg|link=|alt=Aember icon]].

cards.name: Steward Su-uzaynĕ
cards.text: Enhance Aember Aember Draw. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: The Old Tinker
cards.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: The Visible Hand
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. Reveal your hand to your opponent.

cards.name: Trading Frenzy
cards.text: Play: A friendly creature and an enemy creature each capture 3 Aember from their opponent.

cards.name: Shĭgzisŏ Buggy
cards.text: Action: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, gain 2 Aember.

cards.name: Shĭsnyasĭ Buggy
cards.text: Action: Lose 1 Aember. If you do, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Shĭzyokŭ Buggy
cards.text: Action: Reveal two cards from your hand. If they share a house, discard them and make a token creature.

cards.name: Strange Shell
cards.text: Strange Shell cannot fight or reap. Action: Put Strange Shell into your hand.

cards.name: Diplomat
cards.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap' Each player gains 1 Æmber.

cards.name: Trader
cards.text: Action: Steal 1 A. Destroy Merchant.

cards.name: Prospector
cards.text: Destroyed: Draw a card.

cards.name: Big Magnet
cards.text: Play: Chose a friendly creature. Take control of each upgrade in play and move it to that creature.

cards.name: Blorb Hive
cards.text: Omni:'Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, make 2 Blorbs. Then, if you control 10 or more, Blorbs, destroy Blorb Hive and forge a key at no cost.

cards.name: Borka Rikk
cards.text: Each time a Mars card is discarded from your hand, make a token creature.

cards.name: Grondal
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. At the start of your turn, destroy the least powerful creature.

cards.name: Martian Revolution
cards.text: Play: Destroy each friendly creature. For each creature destroyed this way, make a token creature.

cards.name: Nautilixian
cards.text: Nautilixan cannot be used unless you have used 1 or more friendly Mars creatures this turn. Each friendly Pilot creature cannot be dealt damage or destroyed.

cards.name: R-Evolution
cards.text: This creature and each creature with the same name as it gain, "After Reap: Deal 2 Damage to an enemy creature."

cards.name: Replay Pod
cards.text: Each friendly Mars creature gains "Destroyed: Place this creature facedown under Replay Pod."   Action: Put each card under Replay Pod into your hand. Purge Replay Pod.

cards.name: Revo Hooligans
cards.text: Elusive. After Reap: Put a paint counter on an artifact. While that artifact has a paint counter, it belongs to house Mars (instead of its other houses).

cards.name: Airlock
cards.text: Action: Discard a non-Mars card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Ironyx Banner
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Each friendly Ironyx creature gets +1 power and +1 armor.

cards.name: Memrox the Red
cards.text: Your opponent's cards cannot leave your archives. Action: Gain 1 Aember for each card in your archives.

cards.name: Nyyon Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, make 2 token creatures.

cards.name: Space Invaders
cards.text: Play: Reveal any number of creatures from your hand. Put each creature revealed this way into play facedown as a token creature.

cards.name: Suspended Animation
cards.text: Enhance Damage Damage. Play: Put a damaged enemy creature into your archives. If it leaves your archives, put it into its owner's hand instead.

cards.name: Yxl the Iron Captain
cards.text: Play: Each friendly Ironyx creature captures 2 Aember.

cards.name: Zizok
cards.text: Skirmish. Splash-attack 1. After an enemy creature is destroyed by Zizok's splash-attack damage, ready Zizok.

cards.name: Braindart
cards.text: Play: Enrage an enemy creature. It captures 1 Aember from its own side.

cards.name: Clone Home
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If there are more friendly creatures than enemy creatures, archive Clone Home.

cards.name: Genetic Blast
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 Damage to a creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.

cards.name: Glylyx Weaponsmith
cards.text: Enhance Damage Damage Draw. (These icons have been already added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Ironyx Propaganda
cards.text: This creature gains, "After Fight/After Reap: Make a token creature."

cards.name: Ironyx Rebel
cards.text:
Deploy. 
 '''Play:'''(?) Ready each of Ironyx Rebel's neighbors.

cards.name: Ironyx Vatminder
cards.text: Play/Destroyed: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Kaboom!
cards.text: Play: Put each Mars creature into its owner's archives. Destroy each creature. Gain 3 chains.

cards.name: Mk.2 Generator
cards.text: Mk.2 Generator enter play ready. Action: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Myx the Tallminded
cards.text: Your opponent's keys cost +1 Aember for each friendly Mars creature in play.

cards.name: Scoop Up
cards.text: Play: Put a friendly non-Mars creature and an enemy non-Mars creature into your archives. If that enemy creature would leave your archives, return it to its owner's hand instead.

cards.name: Yxlix Mesmerist
cards.text: Action: A creature captures 1 Aember from its own side.

cards.name: Blorb
cards.text: Blorb cannot reap. Destroyed: Return Blorb Hive from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Green Aeronaut
cards.text: Action: A friendly Nautilixian gains Splash-attack 3 for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: Purple Aeronaut
cards.text: After 4 friendly Pilot creatures are used in the same turn, a friendly Nautilixian gains “After Fight: Destroy each enemy creature.” for the remainder of that turn.

cards.name: Red Aeronaut
cards.text: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for a Nautilixian and put it into play, then shuffle your deck. Action: A friendly Nautilixian gets +5 power for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: White Aeronaut
cards.text: Action: Ward and fully heal a friendly Nautilixian.

cards.name: Grunt
cards.text: no text

cards.name: Rebel
cards.text: Reap: Deal 1 D to a creature.

cards.name: Researcher
cards.text: Omni:  Reveal a Mars card from your hand and archive it.

cards.name: Batariel of the Grey
cards.text: After Reap: Ready each Disciple.

cards.name: Friendship
cards.text: When this creature would be dealt damage, if it has 1 or more neighbors, that damage is divided among its neighbors as evenly as possible instead.

cards.name: Halo of Enlightenment
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. This creature cannot be attacked while its controller controls a token creature.

cards.name: Heavy Subsidies
cards.text: Keys cost +6 Aember. Each creature gains, "After Reap: Gain 1 Aember."

cards.name: Renewed Life
cards.text: Play: Fully heal a creature. Make a token creature for each damage healed this way.

cards.name: Sariel the Steadfast
cards.text: While it is not your turn, your creatures cannot become exhausted.

cards.name: The Promised Blade
cards.text: At the start of each player's turn, the player with the fewest creatures in play takes control of The Promised Blade. Omni: A friendly creature captures 1 Aember.

cards.name: Zephon the Opulent
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. Zephon the Opulent cannot be used unless there are 2 or more friendly token creatures in play. After Reap: Gain 2 Aember.

cards.name: Grey Abess
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Each friendly token creature gets +1 armor.

cards.name: Hymn to Duma
cards.text: Each friendly creature gains, "Omni: Destroy this creature. A friendly creature captures 2 Aember."

cards.name: Katerina the Summoner
cards.text: Play/After Reap: Capture 1 Aember. Destroyed: Make a token creature for each Aember on Katerina the Summoner.

cards.name: Lightbringer Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, a friendly creature captures 3 Aember.

cards.name: Martyr of the Vault
cards.text: Destroyed: If your opponent has 7 Aember or more, they lose all but 5 Aember.

cards.name: Squire Recruitment
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature for each friendly Knight creature.

cards.name: Absolve
cards.text: Play: Heal 1 Damage from each creature. Each creature healed this way captures 1 Aember from its opponent.

cards.name: Battlevangelist
cards.text: After Fight: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Celestial Gorm
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Celestial Gorm. Return each other artifact to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Colonel Mariana
cards.text: Play: Each friendly Knight captures 1 Aember.

cards.name: Kassiel the Benevolent
cards.text: Enhance Aember Capture Capture

cards.name: Knightapult
cards.text: Action: The next time a friendly creature enters play this turn, you may have it enter anywhere in your battleline, ready.

cards.name: Membership Drive
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Gain 1 Aember for each friendly token creature.

cards.name: Muster
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If your opponent has more Aember than you, archive Muster.

cards.name: Ostentatious Mount
cards.text:
Play: Move this creature anywhere in its controller's battleline.
This creature gains taunt. (This creature's neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

cards.name: Outflank
cards.text: Play: Each Sanctum flank creature captures 2 Aember from its opponent.

cards.name: Pandulf the Provoker
cards.text: Taunt. (This creature's neighbors can't be attacked unless they have taunt.) Play: Enrage an enemy creature.

cards.name: Request Donations
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. It captures 2 Aember.

cards.name: Retribution
cards.text: Play: If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, destroy an enemy creature.

cards.name: Revered Monk
cards.text: Revered Monk gets +2 power for each of its Sanctum neighbors

cards.name: Disciple
cards.text: Disciple gets +1 power and +1 armor for each Monk neighbor it has.

cards.name: Cleric
cards.text: When Cleric enters play, capture 1 Aember.

cards.name: Defender
cards.text: no text

cards.name: Squire
cards.text: Taunt. (This creature's neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have  taunt.)

cards.name: Aedile Tullia
cards.text: Each time you exalt a friendly non-token creature, make a token creature.

cards.name: Aristotlmimus
cards.text: After Reap: If Aristotlmimus has a wisom counter, draw 1 card, archive 1 card, and play a card from your archives. Otherwise, you may play a card from your archives.

cards.name: Conscription
cards.text: Play: If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, make a number of token creatures equal to the difference.

cards.name: Edict of Nerotaurus
cards.text: After a creature reaps, the next creature used this turn cannot reap. After a creature fights, the next creature used this turn cannot fight.

cards.name: Election
cards.text: Each creature gains, "After Reap: Put a 'for' or 'against' counter on Election".  If there are 6 'for' counters on Election, destroy Election and each creature.  If there are 6 'against' counters on Election, destroy each artifact.

cards.name: Magistrate Crispus
cards.text: At the end of your turn, each player takes control of each creature and artifact they own.

cards.name: Platopelta
cards.text: After Reap: If Platopelta has a wisdom counter, draw 1 card, archive 1 card, and you may put a wisdom counter on Aristotlmimus. Otherwise, archive 1 card.

cards.name: Rampaging Brutodon
cards.text:
Play: Make a token creature.
In order to use Rampaging Brutodon, you must destroy a friendly creature.

cards.name: Socraterosaurus
cards.text: After Reap: Draw 1 card. You may put a wisdom counter on Platopelta.

cards.name: Tectonic Shift
cards.text: Play: Divide each player's battleline in half as evenly as possible without changing the order of creatures. For each battleline, destroy each creature in one of the halves.

cards.name: Training Costs
cards.text: You cannot choose to discard Training Costs from your hand. Play: Lose 2 Aember. If you do not, shuffle Training Costs into your deck.

cards.name: Æmbrosia Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do,  move 1 Aember from a friendly creature to your pool.

cards.name: Chaosodon
cards.text: Splash attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.) Before Fight: Deal 3 Damage to each of Chaosodon's neighbors.

cards.name: Hoplite's Dory
cards.text: This creature gets +2 power for each exhausted creature to its left.

cards.name: Imperator Drusilla
cards.text: Play: Destroy another friendly creature.  While there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, Imperator Drusilla gains splash-attack 4.

cards.name: Inspiring Oration
cards.text: Play: Exalt a friendly creature. Make a token creature for each Aember on that creature.

cards.name: Pax Sauriana
cards.text: Play: Ward each creature.

cards.name: Phalanx Leader
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature immediately to Phalanx Leader's left. After Fight/After Reap: Each creature to Phalanx Leader's left gets +2 power for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: Aquilia, Lone Hero
cards.text: ''Omni:''' Capture 1 Aember if there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures.

cards.name: Arm the Plebeians
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Ward it.

cards.name: Ballistego
cards.text: ''Play:''' You may exalt Ballistego. While Ballistego has Aember on it, it gains splash-attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.)

cards.name: Chancellor Dexterus
cards.text: After Reap: You may exalt Chancellor Dexterus's right neighbor. If you do, that creature belongs to house Saurian for the remainder of the turn (instead of its other houses).

cards.name: Epic Poem
cards.text: Play: Exalt a friendly creature. Gain 1 Aember for each Aember on that creature.

cards.name: Grammaticus Thrax
cards.text: Enhance Capture Capture Damage. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Legionary Trainer
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Each friendly token creature enters play ready.

cards.name: Longusaur Lector
cards.text: Play/After Reap: You may exalt Longusaur Lector. If you do, make a token creature.

cards.name: Pale Into Insignificance
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature with the lowest power.

cards.name: Praetor Marius
cards.text: After Reap: For each exhausted creature to Praetor Marius's left, capture 1 Aember.

cards.name: Recruit
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you exalted a friendly creature this turn, archive Recruit.

cards.name: Symposium
cards.text: Play: Exalt, ready, and use a friendly creature. If it is a token creature, you may exalt, ready and use another friendly creature.

cards.name: Bellatoran Warrior
cards.text: no text

cards.name: Scholar
cards.text: After Reap: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Senator
cards.text: Action: Keys cost +1 A during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Trooper
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: Exalt Trooper.

cards.name: Cultural Exchange
cards.text: Play: Your opponent puts each card from their archives into their hand.

cards.name: Mirror Shell
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. This creature gains, "After Fight/After Reap: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly token creature is a copy of this creature."

cards.name: Norbyn's Cavern
cards.text: Each friendly Æmberling gets +3 power and gains skirmish.

cards.name: Pupgrade
cards.text: Pupgrade may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: "This creature gets +3 power and gains, 'Destroyed: Put Pupgrade on the right flank of your battleline as a creature, ready.'"

cards.name: Recruiting Station
cards.text: Omni: Choose a house. Discard the top card of your deck. If it belongs to the chosen house, make a token creature.

cards.name: Shakedown Sullivan
cards.text: After Reap: Choose a creature and discard the top card of its controller's deck. If that card shares a house with the chosen creature, its controller gains 1 Aember. Otherwise, destroy that creature.

cards.name: Stronger Together
cards.text: Play: Ready each Star Alliance creature that has 2 non-Star Alliance neighbors of different houses.

cards.name: Temporal Purge
cards.text: Play: Flip each token creature faceup. Put each non-creature card flipped this way into its owner's discard pile.

cards.name: Badge of Unity
cards.text: This creature belongs to house Star Alliance in addition to its other houses.

cards.name: Camaraderie
cards.text: Play: Exhaust a friendly Star Alliance creature. If you do, draw 2 cards for each of its non-Star Alliance neighbors.

cards.name: Collector Boren
cards.text: Play: Put an upgrade from your disard pile into your hand. After an upgrade is attached to Collector Boren, ready Collector Boren.

cards.name: FOF Transponder
cards.text: This creature gains, "Destroyed: Make a token creature. Attach FOF Transponder to that creature."

cards.name: Ganymede Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, archive 2 cards.

cards.name: Grunt Work
cards.text: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order. Make a token creature.

cards.name: Quintrino Warp
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature and an enemy creature. Destroy those creatures and each creature that shares a house with either of them. Gain 1 chain.

cards.name: SV3 Lander
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Omni: Destroy SV3 Lander. For the remainder of the turn, you may use friendly token creatures.

cards.name: CPO Zytar
cards.text: Enhance Damage Draw Draw. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Echo Reflector
cards.text: This creature gains, "Your opponent's keys cost +3 A."

cards.name: Friendly Guide
cards.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) After you use one of Friendly Guide's neighbors, you may use Friendly Guide.

cards.name: Future Booster
cards.text: Omni: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Photon Blast
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 Damage to a creature, with 1 Damage splash. If this damage destroys 1 or more creatures, make a token creature.

cards.name: PYR*0
cards.text: Splash-attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.) PYR*O may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: "This creature gains splash-attack 3."

cards.name: Recorded History
cards.text: Play: Reveal up to 3 cards of different houses from your hand. Archive each card revealed this way.

cards.name: Rogue Operation
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. Steal 1 Aember for each house represented among the discarded cards.

cards.name: Scout Chief Korijir
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. After Fight/After Reap: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Specialist Guthrak
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) After Fight/After Reap: Capture 1 Aember for each house represented among Specialist Guthrak and its neighbors.

cards.name: Teamwork
cards.text: Play:Make a token creature. If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, archive Teamwork.

cards.name: Uplink
cards.text: This creature gains, "Action: Make a token creature for each of this creature's non-Star Alliance neighbors"

cards.name: Æmberling
cards.text: Æmberling cannot reap. You may Æmberling as if it were Aember in your pool. (Discard it, ignoring wards.)

cards.name: Cadet
cards.text: Destroyed: Ready Cadet's most powerful neighbor.

cards.name: Explorer
cards.text: After Reap: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it.

cards.name: B0-T
cards.text: Action: Use a friendly non-Star Alliance creature.

cards.name: Brackish Shoreline
cards.text: After a creature fights, it doesn't ready during the "ready cards" step this turn.

cards.name: Bryozoarch
cards.text: When your opponent plays an action card, instead of resolving its play effect, destroy the creature on your left flank.

cards.name: Extrematode Infection
cards.text: Play: Put 3 hatch counters on Extrematode Infection.  At the start of your turn, remove 1 hatch counter from Extrematode Infection. Then if it has no hatch counters, destroy this creature and make 3 token creatures.

cards.name: Giltspine School
cards.text: Play: Make 3 token creatures. Token creatures do not ready during their controller's "ready cards" step.

cards.name: Hypoxia
cards.text: Play: Destroy each token creature.

cards.name: Offering to Kiligog
cards.text: Omni: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, choose a creature in your discard pile. Place it facedown under Offering to Kiligog. Omni: Put each card under Offering to Kiligog into play facedown as a token creature.

cards.name: Plunder
cards.text: Play: Reveal a random unrevealed card from your opponent's hand. Then, you may either repeat this effect or your opponent discards the last revealed card.

cards.name: Primordial Vault
cards.text: At the start of your turn, make a Cultist. Action: Destroy 4 friendly Cultists. If you do, search your deck and discard pile for Tangaika, reveal it, add it to your hand, and shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Sibyl Waimare
cards.text: At the start of your opponent's turn, that player discards the top card of their deck and exhausts each creature of that card's house.

cards.name: Tangaika
cards.text: You cannot play Tanagaika unless you control 4 or more Cultists. Splash-attack 5. After Fight: Gain 1 Æmber.

cards.name: Weak Link
cards.text: This creature gains, "While this creature is exhausted, your keys cost +6 Aember."

cards.name: Azure Basin Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, exhaust 3 enemy creatures.

cards.name: Catch and Release
cards.text: Play: Return each creature to its owner's hand. Each player discards random cards from their hand until they have 6 or fewer cards in hand. Gain 2 chains.

cards.name: Dragnet
cards.text: Play: Return a creature and each neighbor that shares a house with it to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Kelping Hands
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Kelping Hands. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature gains poison.

cards.name: Physaloha
cards.text: Enhance Damage Damage. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.) Damaged creatures do not ready during the "ready cards" step.

cards.name: Soleft
cards.text: Destroyed: Destroy the creature on your opponent's left flank.

cards.name: Stir-Crazy
cards.text: Play: Each ready creature captures 1 Aember from its opponent.

cards.name: Timoti the Dammed
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. While you control a token creature, your opponent cannot forge keys.

cards.name: Watch Your Step
cards.text: Play: Choose a house on your opponent's identity card. If they do not choose this house as their active house during their next turn, make 2 token creatures and ready them.

cards.name: Yanthi Ghostfin
cards.text: Elusive. After Reap: Purge a creature from a discard pile. If you do, make a token creature.

cards.name: Abyssal Sight
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Adult Swim
cards.text: Play: Put each creature with power 3 or lower on top of its owner's deck in a random order.

cards.name: Befuddle
cards.text: Play: Choose a house on your opponent's identity card. During their next turn, they cannot play cards of other houses.

cards.name: Covetous Hema
cards.text: While Covetous Hema is not on a flank, it gains elusive. Play: Capture 3[[File:Enhance_aember.png|18px|frameless|class=aemberImg|link=|alt=Aember icon]].

cards.name: Crushing Deep
cards.text: Play: During your opponent's next turn, keys cost +3 Aember for each forged key they have.

cards.name: Fathom Reaver
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. While you control a token creature, your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card during the "draw cards" step.

cards.name: Initiation
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you have fewer than 4 cards in hand, archive Initiation.

cards.name: Kamalani
cards.text: Destroyed: Make 2 token creatures.

cards.name: Kelpminder
cards.text: Enhance Capture Draw Draw . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Skullback Crab
cards.text: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature during a fight destroys the damaged creature.) Action: Steal 1 Aember.

cards.name: Sunk Cost
cards.text: Play: Choose a house. Your opponent discards a random card from their hand. If that card belongs to the chosen house, make a token creature.

cards.name: Toxicuda Venom
cards.text: This creature gains poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature's power during a fight destroyes the damaged creature.)

cards.name: Cultist
cards.text: Action:  Destroy Cultist. If you do, Ward a friendly creature.

cards.name: Flounderight
cards.text: Destroyed: Destroy the creature on your opponent's right flank.

cards.name: Fish
cards.text: Destroyed: Deal 2 Damage to the most powerful enemy creature.

cards.name: Priest
cards.text: Action: Exhaust an enemy creature.

cards.name: Raider
cards.text: Raider gains poison during your turn. (On your turn, any damage dealt by this creature's power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)
